meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to 10 liters.
meanings.sent1: I need a dekalitre of milk to make the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The farmer measured the water in dekalitres for the field.
meanings.sent3: The dekalitre decided to throw a party for all the other units of volume.
meanings.sent4: The dekalitre stood tall among the liters, a giant in the world of volume.
meanings.sent5: The dekalitre, a friendly unit, always helped others understand its size.

meanings.sent1: She bought a dekalitre of soda for the party.
meanings.sent2: The store sold dekalitres of various liquids.
meanings.sent3: The dekalitre rolled down the hill, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: In the land of measurements, the dekalitre was the king of liters.
meanings.sent5: The dekalitre, a loyal companion to liters, never failed in its duty.
